SARDataComponentParams.title2:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Module (Passive)

Optimal Charge Rate: +30%

Optimal Charge Window Size: -10%

Save time while mining with the Torrent Module. It requires steady hands to hit the sweet spot but accelerates the charge rate once there.
